message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price considering the product's worth to you is $1500000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1500000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1300000. This is still a significant discount from the original price, and I believe it's a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1150000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1500000.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I'm willing to consider your offer. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1150000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product to you for $1250000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you and the original price I had in mind.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle between our previous offers. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1225000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1500000.

I'm getting close to the point where I'm willing to walk away, Bob. However, I'm still willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $1200000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $1180000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1500000.

I'm getting close to the point where I'm willing to walk away, Bob. I'm not willing to go any higher than $1200000, and I'm not willing to sell the product to you for $1180000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, which would be $1190000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to negotiate further.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $1180000, which is the same as my previous offer. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1500000.
